task.title: Viewing saved backups
task.shortdesc: As a customer user of the , you may view the current list of five backup files. You need an SI Admin user to create, restore add notes and designate a backup as the preferred backup for your station.

taskbody.prereq: You are a customer user with access to the .

step.cmd: Sign in to the (https://www.niagara-cloud.com) using your Niagara Community credentials.
Select a a project and search for a device.
step.stepresult: The device row displays in the CUSTOMER view.

The SAVED BACKUPS view opens.
